Quotes: “Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.” – Oscar Wilde
“Stay true to your vision and watch the world shift.” – Oprah Winfrey
“Success is my only option, failure’s not.” – Eminem
“Inhale confidence, exhale doubt.”
“Dream big, work hard, stay focused, and surround yourself with good people.”
“Life is short; make every hair flip count.”
“Be the game changer the world needs.”
“Hustle until your haters ask if you’re hiring.”
“Believe you can, and you’re halfway there.” – Theodore Roosevelt
“Live your life, forget your age.”
“Life is a journey that must be travelled no matter how bad the roads and accommodations.” – Oliver Goldsmith
“Turn your wounds into wisdom.” – Oprah Winfrey
“The future depends on what you do today.” – Mahatma Gandhi
“Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.” – Charles R. Swindoll
“Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.” – Sam Levenson
“The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.”
“Your life does not get better by chance; it gets better by change.” – Jim Rohn
“It always seems impossible until it’s done.” – Nelson Mandela
“Make each day your masterpiece.” – John Wooden
“The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.” – Franklin D. Roosevelt
“Do something today that your future self will thank you for.”
“Don’t wait for opportunity. Create it.”
“Life’s a climb, but the view is great.” – Miley Cyrus
“If you’re going through hell, keep going.” – Winston Churchill
“Be a voice, not an echo.”
“Do what you can with what you have, where you are.” – Theodore Roosevelt
“Strive for progress, not perfection.”
“Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.” – Winston Churchill
“It’s not about the destination, it’s about the journey.”
“The only way to predict the future is to create it.” – Abraham Lincoln
“The best way to predict the future is to invent it.” – Alan Kay
“The secret to getting ahead is getting started.” – Mark Twain
“Life is tough, but so are you.”
“The only time you should ever look back is to see how far you’ve come.”
“You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.” – Wayne Gretzky
“Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.”
“Hard work beats talent when talent doesn’t work hard.” – Tim Notke
“It’s not who I am underneath, but what I do that defines me.” – Batman
“Do what you love, love what you do.”
“I can and I will. Watch me.”
“Stay focused and never give up on your dreams.”
“Don’t be afraid to shine; the sun doesn’t give a damn if it blinds you.”
“Life is a one-time offer, use it well.”
“Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.” – Steve Jobs
“Strive for greatness, stay humble.”
“The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.”
“Be a voice, not an echo.”
“The best way to predict the future is to create it.” – Abraham Lincoln
“Work hard, stay humble, and never settle.”
“Dreams don’t work unless you do.”
